statements: UPDATE energy_impacts SET carbon_footprint = 10.5, water_usage = 5.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE energy_impacts SET land_impact = 3.8, energy_source = 'Solar Power' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE energy_impacts SET carbon_footprint = 12.5, water_usage = 8.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE energy_impacts SET energy_source = 'Wind Power', land_impact = 5.3 WHERE energy_source = 'Solar Power';
UPDATE Environmental_Impacts SET energy_source='Solar', emissions_level=3.5, water_usage=10.2 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Energy_Production_Methods SET efficiency=0.95, carbon_capture=true, method_name='Hydroelectric' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Environmental_Impacts SET emissions_level = 4.8, water_usage = 3.2 WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
UPDATE Energy_Production_Methods SET efficiency = 0.85, method_name = 'Hydroelectric', carbon_capture = TRUE WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE bioenergy_impact SET carbon_emissions = 500.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE production_methods SET description = 'New description for the method' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE bioenergy_impact SET production_method='Biomass Gasification', carbon_emissions=15.75 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE production_methods SET description='A process that converts biomass into a gaseous form for energy production' WHERE method_name='Biomass Gasification';
UPDATE EnergyProduction SET production_quantity = 150 WHERE production_id = 1;
UPDATE EnergyProduction SET production_date = '2022-05-25', production_quantity = 300 WHERE production_id = 2;
UPDATE EnergySources SET carbon_intensity = 10.5 WHERE source_id = 1
UPDATE EnergyProduction SET production_quantity = 5000, production_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE production_id = 3
UPDATE environmental_impacts SET impact_description = 'Updated impact description' WHERE impact_id = 1;
UPDATE energy_production SET production_name = 'New Production Name', production_description = 'New Production Description' WHERE production_id = 3;
UPDATE environmental_impacts SET impact_name = 'Reduced Emissions', impact_description = 'Reducing carbon footprint' WHERE impact_id = 1;
UPDATE energy_production SET production_description = 'Eco-friendly energy production', production_name = 'Solar Power' WHERE source_id = 1;
